original_text: They brought Uriah back from there to King Jehoiakim. The king punished Uriah with death. They threw his dead body in the place where they buried poor people.
korean_text: 그들이 우리야를 애굽에서 연행하여 여호야김 왕에게로 그를 데려오매 왕이 칼로 그를 죽이고 그의 시체를 평민의 묘지에 던지게 하니라

sentences.original_text: They brought Uriah back from there
The king punished Uriah with death
in the place where they buried poor people
